user.title: Local Weather Forecast Setup
user.description: Configure your local weather forecast based on barometric pressure. This integration provides ~94% accurate weather predictions without external API dependencies.

data.pressure_at_sealevel: Pressure Sensor Already at Sea Level

data_description.pressure_sensor: Barometric pressure sensor (required). Must provide values in hPa (hectopascals).
data_description.temperature_sensor: Temperature sensor (needed if pressure is not at sea level). Must provide values in °C (Celsius).
data_description.wind_direction_sensor: Wind direction in degrees (0-360°). Improves forecast accuracy, especially for detecting weather fronts.
data_description.wind_speed_sensor: Wind speed in km/h or m/s. Improves forecast accuracy by determining wind factor.
data_description.elevation: Your location's elevation in meters above sea level (used to calculate sea level pressure from station pressure).
data_description.pressure_type: Select whether your sensor provides absolute station pressure (QFE) or relative sea level pressure (QNH). Most sensors provide absolute pressure.
data_description.language: Language for forecast text and descriptions

init.title: Local Weather Forecast Options
init.description: Update your local weather forecast configuration.

data_description.humidity_sensor: Humidity sensor for enhanced fog risk detection, dew point calculation, and rain probability (optional)
data_description.wind_gust_sensor: Wind gust sensor for atmospheric stability detection and severe weather alerts (optional)
data_description.rain_rate_sensor: Rain detection sensor with device_class='precipitation' and unit='mm'. The integration automatically detects rain when sensor value > 0 (Netatmo: increments 0.101, 0.202... / Ecowitt WS90: similar). Do NOT use hourly total sensors (optional)
data_description.dewpoint_sensor: Dew point sensor to override calculated values (optional)
data_description.solar_radiation_sensor: Solar radiation sensor in W/m² for accurate feels-like temperature. If UV Index sensor is provided, solar radiation can be calculated automatically (optional)
data_description.uv_index_sensor: UV Index sensor (0-15 scale). If Solar Radiation sensor is provided, UV Index can be calculated automatically. Used for sun protection alerts and apparent temperature (optional)
data_description.cloud_coverage_sensor: Cloud coverage sensor (%) to adjust solar radiation effects on apparent temperature (optional)
data_description.enable_weather_entity: Create a weather entity that can be used in weather cards and automations
